name: Visit Site Settings
author: Ray Holt (Holt Information Systems)

sections.installation:
1. Unzip and Upload the visit-site-settings directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the check box in Personal Options to set your preference.
sections.faq:
I installed the plugin but it’s not opening the visit site link in a new window

Visit Site Settings 2.0 requires you to set your personal preference, it doesn’t just automatically make the change. Check your Personal Options to be sure the check box is checked.

Why is this plugin not automatically installed with WordPress?

For one, it’s new. Other than that I’m not sure. Contact Matt and say Ray sent you. http://ma.tt/contact/
sections.changelog:
2.0.1

  • Adds the menu support page for holtis.com.

2.0

  • Adds the per user option for visit site settings.

1.0

  • Global setting of visit site to open in a new window.
sections.description:
This plugin enables the administrative dashboard’s “Visit Site” link to open in a new window through added visit site setting in personal options.

Arbitrary section

When a new user is registered they are generally taken to the Profile page where they can choose their settings under Personal Options. For currently registered users you must go into your profile and change the visit site setting under Personal Options.

description:
This plugin enables the administrative dashboard’s “Visit Site” link to open in a new window through added visit site setting in personal options.

Arbitrary section

When a new user is registered they are generally taken to the Profile page where they can choose their settings under Personal Options. For currently registered users you must go into your profile and change the visit site setting under Personal Options.

upgrade_notice.2.0: This version gives each user the option to set the visit site link to open in a new window. Upgrade today.
